## perpendicularCW variable

Inline function. Returns clockwise perpendicular vector (assuming Y-up). \[y,-x\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
perpendicularCW: (v: Vec2Term) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Lit<"vec2">
```
